title: GovernmentService
description: A service provided by a government organization, e.g. food stamps, veterans benefits, etc.

jurisdiction.description: Indicates a legal jurisdiction, e.g. of some legislation, or where some government service is based.

serviceOperator.description: The operating organization, if different from the provider.  This enables the representation of services that are provided by an organization, but operated by another organization like a subcontractor.
